attributes.action: Give 16 and 17 year olds a vote on our eu membership
attributes.additional_details: The recent referendum result affects 16 and 17 year olds but they have had no voice. A precedent for this was set in the recent Scottish referendum where there political engagement was very strong
attributes.background: Allow 16 and 17 year olds to have a vote in second referendum on our eu membership as it is their future
